name: imageWriteBase64
description: Writes Base64 images to the specified filename and destination.

params.name: name
params.description: The image on which this operation is performed.

params.name: destination
params.description: The path for the destination file.

params.name: inHTMLFormat
params.description: Specify whether Base64 output includes the headers used by the Base64 images in the HTML 'img' tag ('data:image/{format};base64,...')

params.name: overwrite
params.description: If set to true, overwrites the destination file.

examples.title: Using translateDrawingAxis member function
examples.description: CF11+ Write a base64 representation of an image
